Building with Accessibility

A website is the first impression a customer gets about your business. Why settle for just okay?

At Kaffeinated Kodemonkey we understand what it takes to reach every customer.

With a platform developed for accessibility your site can rise above the competition.

pour Principles

  • Perceivable - Users must be able to perceive the information being presented
  • Operable - Users must be able to operate the interface easily
  • Understandable - Users must be able to understand the user interface
  • Robust - Users must be able to access the content as technologies advance

Delivering content that is accessible by everyone.

Interpersonally, she is also a wonderful communicator. Her open, positive, fun to talk to, forward-thinking, energetic personality and style make all involved effort a pleasure. Certainly the site is not yet complete, but if what I see today is any indication, the CISC Board and Member Agencies will be delighted with the final result.
